topics.body: What's that, Birdie? The new Mad Max game is coming out in 2 months? Eh, might as well try it out. What's that, Birdie? Teen Titans Go is getting 100 episodes? Good, I can't wait till the producers call every one of their legitimate critics little children. What's that, Birdie? Penguin meat is extremely delicious? I know that. That's why I cut off your limbs. Now get back into the basement. Wait a second, you delicious flightless bird! It's being developed by Avalanche Studios, the team behind the Just Cause series, isn't it? Now I gotta get this game.
topics.author: 554d477e63687270dee30600

topics.body: Tip for accurate shooting: Take your time and feel the shot.

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5597aed46368723efc001b60#post_5597aed46368723efc001b60
Don't forget to breathe.
And if the gun you're using has recoil, don't fight it. Ride it.

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5597b0d86368726157001014#post_5597b0d86368726157001014
All guns have recoil. Expect it and brace yourself.
Also,
How do you shoot your revolver? I shoot pistols left-handed, standing on my side, with only one hand extended.

topics.body: You know what my favorite part about Independence Day (the holiday not the movie) is? FOr the longest time there's been a stereotype attributed to Americans as being loud, obnoxious, in-your-face. and so forth. And while some of those stereotypes are blatantly wrong, on this one magnificent day, we EMBRACE that. We become the loudest, most obnoxious, most cheerful motherfuckers ever!
